gaeaActions.sql: CREATE TABLE tbl_test_replace (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), age INT)
CREATE TABLE tbl_temp_replace  (id INT, name VARCHAR(50), age INT)
REPLACE INTO tbl_test_replace (id, name, age) VALUES (1, 'newUser1', 35)
REPLACE INTO tbl_test_replace SET id = 2, name = 'User2', age = 30
REPLACE INTO tbl_test_replace (id, name, age) SELECT id, name, age FROM tbl_temp_replace  WHERE id = 1
REPLACE LOW_PRIORITY INTO tbl_test_replace SET id = 1, name = 'User1', age = 40
